roasts.name: Espresso Apex
roasts.tasting_notes: Wild, funky, occasionally sweet, rewarding, complex and challenging. Great as drip. Very far out of the ordinary, in a good way.

roasts.name: Primo
roasts.tasting_notes: Complex, interesting, occasaionally sweet, unusual, slightly bizarre, finicky and difficult. Wonderfully weird. A new favorite.
